name: House4
_source: speak;Kyle;My brother is -{w} uh -{w} quite the interesting character.{w}{clear}He believes he's married and has a wife, but -{w} uh, ha-ha -{w} it's all in his head.{w}{clear}He's been drinking a lot lately,{w} I've been a bit worried about him.{w}{clear}If you have any doctors,{w} could you ask them to treat him using this?{w}{clear}Thanks.{w}{clear}Get out of my house.
